message_history.content: Machine learning is a type of artificial intelligence that enables computer programs to learn from data and improve over time without being explicitly programmed.
Some commonly used tools in machine learning include Python, TensorFlow, Keras, scikit-learn, and PyTorch.

In machine learning, architecture refers to the overall design or structure of a machine learning model. This includes the number and type of layers, the type of activation functions used, and other design choices that can affect the performance of the model. Choosing the appropriate architecture is a critical task in developing effective machine learning models.
